name: SonicAnimate Error
description:
Welcome To 

So Yeah They’re Interrupt Your PC

Session To Bring You Up a SonicAnimate Error!

That’s No Good! You Feel Uncomfortable At This Error,

You Have Some Options Here:

You Will Leave It On Or You Will Turn Off Your PC? There Are Some Alternative Lines Anyway! :)

But Be Careful!

If You Lose 12 Chances, You Have To Enter The Code.

If You Get The Code Correct, Then You Will Receive The Good Ending.

But If You Get The Code Wrong, Then You Will Receive The Bad Ending

And The Best Ending:

You Need To Call For Help When You Reach To The 4 Chances And Sonic Will Get Rid Of SonicAnimate Error.

Good Luck! ;)
